title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\SetSuggestionFeatureConfigRequest
name: SetSuggestionFeatureConfigRequest
description:
The request message for [ConversationProfiles.SetSuggestionFeature][].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.SetSuggestionFeatureConfigRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.conversation_profile
params.description: Required. The Conversation Profile to add or update the suggestion feature config. Format: projects/<Project ID>/locations/<Location ID>/conversationProfiles/<Conversation Profile ID>.

params.name: data.participant_role
params.description: Required. The participant role to add or update the suggestion feature config. Only HUMAN_AGENT or END_USER can be used.

params.name: data.suggestion_feature_config
params.description: Required. The suggestion feature config to add or update.
